snippet: The breakup of the Publicis-Omnicom merger offers some lessons about big deals. | A star banker at Goldman Sachs is leaving. | Citizens Bank is facing a stormy spinoff. | The maker of Botox faces more pressure about an unsolicited takeover bid.
abstract: The breakup of the Publicis-Omnicom merger offers some lessons about big deals. | A star banker at Goldman Sachs is leaving. | Citizens Bank is facing a stormy spinoff. | The maker of Botox faces more pressure about an unsolicited takeover bid.
